text: Ioannis Papaioannou (; born 20 April 1976) is a Greek chess grandmaster. He is a four-time Greek Chess Champion. ==Chess career== Born in 1976, Papaioannou earned his grandmaster title in 1998. He won the Greek Chess Championship in 1997, 1998, 1999, and 2007. He is the No. 1 ranked Greek player as of October 2020. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Greek chess players Category:Sportspeople from Athens
title: Ioannis Papaioannou
